## ğŸš€ Contributing Guide

### ğŸ‘‡ Branch Naming Convention
Please name your branches like:
```
[type]/[short-description]
```
Examples:
- `feat/add-hmr-sync`
- `fix/path-typo`
- `docs/update-readme`

### ğŸ“¥ Pull Requests
- Open a pull request to `main`.
- PR must pass CI and branch name check.
- At least one review required before merge.

### ğŸ›¡ï¸ Protected Branches
- ğŸ”’ `main` is protected from direct pushes and force-pushes.
- âœ… All changes must go through Pull Requests.
